function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Fast transmission rates of the virus","Impact":"Increased risk of widespread infection","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols and social distancing measures","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, air purification systems","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Mental health and physical well-being concerns for employees","Impact":"Decreased productivity, increased absenteeism","Mitigation":"Providing mental health support, flexible work arrangements","Technologies":"Telemedicine, wellness apps","People":"Employees, employers","Owner":"Human resources, management"},{"Description":"Lingering persistence of the virus","Impact":"Continued threat of outbreaks and resurgence","Mitigation":"Investing in vaccine research and development, maintaining public health measures","Technologies":"Vaccine development, advanced testing technologies","People":"General population","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"}]}
